infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos of potential bed bug hiding spots during your room inspection.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app saves inspection photos to your library for your records.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to connect you with local pest control professionals in your area.
